mask_virga_layer.long_name: Virga mask on radar coordinates, separated for each cloud layer.

mask_cloud.note: True if cloud is identified by selecting valid radar signal between cloud base and top.

mask_cloud_layer.long_name: Cloud mask on radar coordinates, separated for each cloud layer
mask_cloud_layer.note: True if cloud is identified by selecting valid radar signal between cloud base and top.

flag_virga.note: True if virga is identified at a certain time-step.

flag_cloud.note: True if there is any cloud at a certain time-step.

flag_virga_layer.long_name: Flag virga at time-step within a cloud layer.
flag_virga_layer.note: True if virga is identified within a cloud layer at a certain time-step.

flag_cloud_layer.long_name: Flag cloud at time-step within at cloud layer.
flag_cloud_layer.note: True if a cloud is identified at a certain cloud layer and time-step.

number_cloud_layers.note: Count of the number of identified cloud layers which at a certain time-step contain a cloud.

virga_top_height.note: virga top height according to upper edge of last range gate with virga

virga_base_height.note: virga base height according to lower edge of first range gate with virga

virga_depth.note: This value excludes range-gates where radar reflectivity is zero or nan. It is calculated by sum(rangegates_with_virga_top - rangegates_with_virga_base)

virga_depth_maximum_extend.note: This value includes range-gates where radar reflectivity is zero or nan. Therefore, this is a measure of geometric maximum depth of virga. For volumetric statistics it is advisable to use virga_depth (excluding empty radar range-gates).

flag_lcl_filled.note: True if lowest CBH is filled with calculated lifting-condensation-level

flag_cbh_interpolated.note: True if CBH value is interpolated and not observed

flag_surface_rain.note: True if rain is detected at surface.

flag_lowest_rg_rain.note: True if rain is detected at the lowest radar range-gate.

number_cloud_layer.note: Number of detected cloud layers at given time-step.

range_top.long_name: calculated top of radar range gate

range_base.long_name: calculated base of radar range gate
